name: RemoveUnnecessaryElements: ITpro
description:
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/article/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/management/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/system/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/middleware/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/develop/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/win/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/oss/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/server/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/security/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/network/*
http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/ittrend/*
上記のコンテンツ内のPR、headerのバナー広告を消去

http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/article/*
の1カラム化etc
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/article/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/management/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/system/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/middleware/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/develop/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/win/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/oss/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/server/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/security/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/network/")
, url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/ittrend/") {

table[width="1000"] table[width="300"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="413"] table[width="403"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="749"] iframe
, table[width="1000"] tr[valign="bottom"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="999"][align="center"]
, table[width="1000"] div[style]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="586"] img[width="540"][height="22"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="586"] img[width="540"][height="22"] + br + table
{display: none !important; }
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://itpro.nikkeibp.co.jp/article/") {

table[width="1000"] td[width="586"]
{ width: 1000px !important; }

iframe[width="728"]
, table[width="999"][height="120"]
, ul#gnav
, table[width="1000"] td[width="413"]
, table[width="1000"] tr[valign="bottom"] td
, table[width="540"] table[width="540"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="586"] > table[width="540"]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="586"] > div[style]
, table[width="1000"] td[width="999"][align="center"]
{ display:none !important; }

}
